#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
        int num;
		int	sigma;
		int	ctr;
    while(cin >> num)
	 {	
        sigma=num;
        while(sigma) 
		{
                ctr=sigma%10;
                if(ctr!=0 && num%ctr !=0)
                {
                    cout << "Invalid" << endl;
                    break;
                }
           sigma=sigma/10;
        }
        if(sigma==0)
                cout << "Valid" << endl;
	 }
   return 0;
}
